#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long 
#define ull unsigned long long 
#define f(i,n) for(i=0;i<n;i++)
#define sc(a) scanf("%lld",&a)
#define vect_int vector<int>
#define pb(x) push_back(x)
#define lb lower_bound
#define ub upper_bound
#define pf(a) printf("%lld\n",a)
#define pfs(a) printf("%lld ",a)
int main() {
	// your code goes here
 	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	ull i,a[88],t,n;
	a[0]=a[1]=1;
	for(i=2;i<88;i++)
	a[i]=(a[i-1]+a[i-2]);
	sc(t);
	while(t--)
	{
		sc(n);
		f(i,n)
		{
			if(a[i]%26==0)
			{
				printf("Z");
			}
			else
			printf("%c",(a[i]%26)-1+'A');
		}
		printf("\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
